title: Warm Clothes for Street Children
description: Distributing warm clothes to children living on the streets to protect them from the cold.

title: Blanket Distribution in Hill Tracts
description: Providing blankets and warm clothing to families in the Chittagong Hill Tracts.

title: Winter Relief for Elderly in Villages
description: Supplying warm clothing and blankets to elderly people in remote villages.

title: Coat Drive for Underprivileged Kids
description: Collecting and distributing coats to underprivileged children during winter.

title: Jacket Donation for Rural Communities
description: Distributing jackets to families in rural areas facing harsh winter conditions.

title: Warm Clothes for Slum Dwellers
description: Providing warm clothes to slum dwellers to help them survive the cold season.

title: Sweater Donation for School Children
description: Distributing sweaters to school children in low-income areas.

title: Warm Clothing for Homeless People
description: Providing warm clothes and blankets to homeless individuals during the winter.

title: Winter Aid for Orphanages
description: Donating winter clothes and blankets to orphanages to keep the children warm.
